thread.title: Tell Us Your Preferred New York City Airport
thread.title_full: Tell Us Your Preferred New York City Airport

author: THE NEW YORK TIMES
title: Tell Us Your Preferred New York City Airport
text: Tell Us Your Preferred New York City Airport By THE NEW YORK TIMES FEB. 17, 2017   Photo La Guardia Airport, left, and Kennedy Airport. All things being equal, what New York City area airport would you choose? Credit Left: Uli Seit for The New York Times; Right: Alex Wroblewski for The New York The Yankees or Mets?A yellow cab or Uber?The Met or MoMA? New Yorkers tend to be very opinionated, and they take a lot of pride in that. Those strong “preferences” will undoubtedly turn up this holiday weekend as travelers — whether New Yorkers or not — pick which airport to use: Kennedy Airport or La Guardia Airport? So we want to know: Which New York City area airport do you prefer? Or maybe it doesn’t matter. Or maybe it’s Newark Liberty International Airport. We know that other variables — cost, flight times, proximity, destinations, airline — are at play. But if all things were equal, which New York City area airport would you prefer and why? We may include your response in a project. Your personal information will be kept confidential. An editor or reporter may reach out to you for reporting purposes. Deadline: Feb. 20 at 5 p.m. Eastern. First and last name * New York City neighborhood or other city * Your preferred New York area airport: * Kennedy International Airport
